0.1.name: wordpress/lmbbox-wordpress-plugin-api
0.1.description: A WordPress Plugin API class that allows plugin developers to have a standard management class for their plugin. All options and menu pages are handled through the plugin api class. I have included a test plugin to demonstrate usage of the API. More documentation will come ...
